title: Persons of Interest in Armed Kidnapping (Gun), 1300 b/o Corcoran St, NW, on August 24, 2021
author: OfficialDCPolice
comment: Becoming  stereotype, one deed at a time.
i'm sure they just wanted to borrow money for a loaf of bread
The usual suspects. I'm sure they all good boys 'n sheeit.
Meh, exactly who you thought it was🤷🏾‍♂️defund single mothers
Yes lil boy they locked your ignorant tail up .Good job MPD
description:
The Metropolitan Police Department seeks the public's assistance in identifying two persons of interest in reference to an Kidnapping While Armed (Gun) incident which occurred in the 1300 block of Corcoran Street, NW, on Tuesday, August 24, 2021, at approximately 10:30 PM. The subjects were subsequently captured by a nearby surveillance camera.

The Metropolitan Police Department currently offers a reward of up to $10,000 to anyone who provides information that leads to the arrest and conviction of the person or persons responsible for a violent crime committed in the District of Columbia. Ref.: CCN #21-120-179

Anyone who can identify these individuals or who has knowledge of this incident should take no action but call police at (202) 727-9099 or text your tip to the Department's TEXT TIP LINE to 50411.

To learn more about the MPD Rewards program, please visit www.mpdc.dc.gov/rewards.
